dct_description_sm: Oriented with north toward bottom left of sheet in Chorographica terrae sanctae descriptio; oriented with north toward left of sheet in Castra Israelitarum in deserto.
3 inset maps: Syriae veteris descriptio; Castra Israelitarum in deserto; Peregrinatio Israelitarum in deserto.
From Biblia Sacra polyglotta... Vol. I, Chronologia Sacra, after p.52, editit Brianus Waltonus, London: Thomas Roycroft, 1657.
